thread.title: What breed of psychopath is Max? EastEnders fans can't get over him eating bacon sandwich as brother Jack 'annihilates' Danny
thread.title_full: What breed of psychopath is Max? EastEnders fans can't get over him eating bacon sandwich as brother Jack 'annihilates' Danny

author: Claire Rutter
title: What breed of psychopath is Max? EastEnders fans can't get over him eating bacon sandwich as brother Jack 'annihilates' Danny
text:
What breed of psychopath is Max? EastEnders fans can't get over him eating bacon sandwich as brother Jack 'annihilates' Danny The sinister scene was aired on the BBC One show as Jack mourned loss of Ronnie Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Tensions were running high in Friday night's second part of EastEnders , and Danny got a severe hiding. 
Viewers were delighted when Danny got roughed up by Jack in the living room but were perturbed and amused as his brother Max watched on, all while sorting himself out a bacon sandwich. 
You don't come between this man and his food it would seem. 
The scene saw Danny demand £20,000 from Jack for a 'favour', and Jack's face quickly changed as he said: “You trying to make money out of me?” Max wanted to know how much Danny wanted from his brother for the 'favour' (Photo: BBC) While Jack beat up Danny - Max carried on eating his sandwich (Photo: BBC) 
Less than three seconds later he's being floored by Jack, and is screaming for Max to get him off. But Max is more interested in his bacon butty. 
“What breed of psychopath is Max? Who sauces one half of a bacon sandwich at a time?! #eastenders,” one viewer joked. 
While another delighted viewer wrote: “#EastEnders I'm so glad that Danny got a pasting from Jack. That bumptious p****! He had it coming mate.” Danny got a beating when he wanted money from Jack (Photo: BBC) Max was not going to stop eating his bacon butty (Photo: BBC) 
One Twitter user wrote: “Jack and Max are the baddest. Jack annihilating Danny and Max puts ketchup on his food. Spectacular #EastEnders”. Read More 
But another saw the darker side to the scene: “Max just sitting there putting sauce on his sandwich was amazingly sadistic. #EastEnders”. Danny won't make that mistake again (Photo: BBC) 
Another avid EastEnders viewer compared it to killer Bobby: “Jack beating that guy up gave me memories of Bobby attacking Jane #EastEnders”. 
But it seems that Max's method of putting ketchup on his sarnie was what got most attention, as one critic wrote: “@bbceastenders I've seen some horrible things in my time on Eastenders but the way Max ruined that sandwich with ketchup is unforgivable.” Like us on Facebook
